exam.question: Body paint or face paint is used mostly by men in pre-literate societies in order to attract good health or to ______ disease.

answer.explain: 句意： 在史前社会， 人们通常在身体或脸上画画以期获得健康并驱除疾病。set aside： 留出， 取消； shrug off： 摆脱； give away： 放弃。
